TIFF tag reference.

tif_tags_reference.Rd

A dataset containing the information on all known baseline and extended TIFF tags.

tif_tags_reference()

Source

https://www.awaresystems.be

Details

A data frame with 96 rows and 10 variables:

code_dec

decimal numeric code of the TIFF tag

code_hex

hexadecimal numeric code of the TIFF tag

name

the name of the TIFF tag

short_description

a short description of the TIFF tag

tag_type

the type of TIFF tag: either "baseline" or "extended"

url

the URL of the TIFF tag at https://www.awaresystems.be

libtiff_name

the TIFF tag name in the libtiff C library

c_type

the C type of the TIFF tag data in libtiff

count

the number of elements in the TIFF tag data

default

the default value of the data held in the TIFF tag

Examples

tif_tags_reference()
#> # A tibble: 96 x 10
#>    code_dec code_hex name  short_descripti… type  url   libtiff_name c_type
#>       <dbl> <chr>    <chr> <chr>            <chr> <chr> <chr>        <chr> 
#>  1      254 00FE     NewS… A general indic… base… http… TIFFTAG_SUB… LONG  
#>  2      255 00FF     Subf… A general indic… base… http… TIFFTAG_OSU… SHORT 
#>  3      256 0100     Imag… The number of c… base… http… TIFFTAG_IMA… SHORT…
#>  4      257 0101     Imag… The number of r… base… http… TIFFTAG_IMA… SHORT…
#>  5      258 0102     Bits… Number of bits … base… http… TIFFTAG_BIT… SHORT 
#>  6      259 0103     Comp… Compression sch… base… http… TIFFTAG_COM… SHORT 
#>  7      262 0106     Phot… The color space… base… http… TIFFTAG_PHO… SHORT 
#>  8      263 0107     Thre… For black and w… base… http… TIFFTAG_THR… SHORT 
#>  9      264 0108     Cell… The width of th… base… http… TIFFTAG_CEL… SHORT 
#> 10      265 0109     Cell… The length of t… base… http… TIFFTAG_CEL… SHORT 
#> # … with 86 more rows, and 2 more variables: count <chr>, default <chr>
